readme-vars.app_setup_block:
You must first create a mysql database for Pydio Cells. Using our [mariadb image](https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/mariadb) is recommended.  

Then access the web gui setup wizard at `https://SERVER_IP:8080` if accessing locally (must set `SERVER_IP` env var), or at `https://pydio-cells.domain.com` if reverse proxying.

changelogs.desc: Rebasing to alpine 3.17. Adding multi-arch support. Updating cli arguments for v4 compatibility.
Rebasing to alpine 3.16. Upgrading to s6v3. Updating build instructions for v4.
Switch to https as default (only affects new installs). Add self signed cert, add `SERVER_IP` var for adding to cert as SAN. Add optional gRPC port mapping for CellsSync.
Update compile options, previous release was broken for new installs.
